tender_title: Construction of Boundary Wall, Earth filling, Drinking water, Latrine and Urinal including box culvert at U.N. Brahma College Women Hostel, Dotma
Work Description: Construction of Boundary Wall, Earth filling, Drinking water, Latrine and Urinal including box culvert at U.N. Brahma College Women Hostel, Dotma in Kokrajhar District under SOPD for the financial year 2018-19.
